document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Least </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Bee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Brew </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Honey's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Worth </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">multiply </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Content </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">smallest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">fraction </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">help </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Amber </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Quantity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Least bee that brew a honey's weight
